title: any chance to get rank back?
body: literally lost 4 games in a row bc team gave up after first five minutes and started throwing, is there anyway i could get a chance back at my rank?

replies.body:
We're not able to modify your ranked standings, LP, or any match history. The system was designed this way to prevent any sort of abuse of the system.

Bad games happen, and when situations like yours happen, the best move is to simply report them for leaving the game or throwing and move on. I'm confident that if you keep grinding at it, you'll hit your goals for the season.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

All you have to do now. Is go win some games ! :) 

Best of luck!
